title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 167-2.10 - Refusal to submit to search-denial of entry
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 167-2.10 - Refusal to submit to search-denial of entry

State Regulations
A refusal to submit to a search when ordered or when not
consented to shall result in a denial of permission to enter or remain on
facility grounds. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
167-2.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
